TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_magal_kanailil, title = magal_kanailil, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/magal_kanailil} }

S.FORM: magal kanailil icami ka matuuwal (masiqun kakawsa) san ku magal kanailil. kiya ku magal kanailil yi tinqalangang niyam iwan na rahuwal na uwawu qutux naniqan kaxbarg. imuwag naku makurakis/marakiyas sumilma cu qasinu ru quwawu na turakis sipaqaneq cu rumaruma, makurakis/marakiyas bali nanak ku magawp mapa-iyu uwi cu qaraqarax ka sasilhu inlungang. pasibaqan cu kai naku malhow, sasilawkahan naku rawirawing ku inha.

magal kanailil icami ka matoowal (masiqon kakawsa) san ko magal kanailil. kiya ko magal kanailil yi tinqalangang niyam iwan na rahowal na owawo qotox naniqan kaxbarg. imowag nako makorakis/marakiyas somilma co qasino ro qowawo na torakis sipaqaneq co romaroma, makorakis/marakiyas bali nanak ko magawp mapa-iyo owi co qaraqarax ka sasilho inlongang. pasibaqan co kai nako malhow, sasilawkahan nako rawirawing ko inha.
